issues.details: Trumpâ€™s approval rating fell to 36% in a Gallup poll (Marchâ€¯25â€¯2025), the lowest since his inauguration, and 38% in an Ipsos poll (Marchâ€¯14â€‘17â€¯2025). Earlier in the year his rating hovered in the 40s, dropping to 37% in July before a brief rebound.

evaluations.opinion: The decline is largely attributed to economic concerns, especially high inflation, which voters cite as the main reason for their dissatisfaction.

confirmed_facts: Trumpâ€™s approval rating was 47% in February 2025 and 37% in July 2025.

timeline.event: Gallup poll: 36% approval, lowest since inauguration
